nodes.text: Geonosian royal guards were Geonosian warriors who served as bodyguards. In 21 BBY, during the Second Battle of Geonosis, two escorted Archduke Poggle the Lesser to the Progate Temple.
Geonosian royal guards first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Legacy of Terror." They were first identified in the original episode guide for the episode.
